thumb.title: Faithless [original song, Vocaloid, Lucas]
thumb.description: LyricsBuild an impressionStraight brush, curving roundClaude’s subtle gesturesLight touch, hence no soundHeart never openedHardly dentedNot a great stateTo leave your pillow or your soulWhen you ignore meThen final warnings soundThose nagging undertonesSiren wailing loudHeart never openedHardly dentedNot a great stateTo leave your pillow or your soul
